Text: Cc Mike I spoke to Alan Kent from the Title Company this morning He was there signing the Contract and I assume depositing the balance of earnest money I reminded him that we were looking to him to acquire and pay for the Survey He indicated that would not be a problem As soon as the Commitment for Title Insurance is issued and the Survey completed a closing date will be set If you have any questions please call or Email me back Don Stirman
